details:
verb
- perform surgery on
= example: perform surgery on
= synonyms: operate on
- happen
= synonyms: develop, recrudesce
- perform a movement in military or naval tactics in order to secure an advantage in attack or defense
= synonyms: maneuver
- handle and cause to function
= example: handle and cause to function
= synonyms: control
- keep engaged
= synonyms: mesh
- perform as expected when applied
= synonyms: run
- direct or control
= synonyms: run
